3. "Inception" (2010) - This mind-bending movie explores the concept of shared dreaming and features a talented cast, including Leonardo DiCaprio, Joseph Gordon-Levitt, and Ellen Page.
4. "Interstellar" (2014) - Directed by Christopher Nolan, this visually stunning film follows a team of astronauts as they travel through wormholes in search of a new home for humanity.
5. "Arrival" (2016) - This thought-provoking movie tells the story of a linguist who is recruited by the military to communicate with aliens who have landed on Earth, and explores themes of language, time, and culture.

I hope these recommendations are helpful! Let me know if you have any other questions or preferences.
